CustomField.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Opportunity Details Captured", "Missing: "&IF( ISPICKVAL( Type ,""),"Type, ","")&""&IF(LEN( TEXT(MONTH(CloseDate))) = 0, "Close Date, ","")&""&IF( Amount <= 0, "Amount, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL( LeadSource,""), "Lead Source, ","")&""&IF( LEN(NextStep)=0, "Next Steps",""))
CustomField.label: Data Quality Description
